name: Intagono
description:
Intagono is an interactive agency based in Guadalajara, Mexico. We are 22 people strong and have been around since Feb 2011. 
We focus on ideas, web, mobile, social media, advertising, analytics and emerging media. We build great online experiences, on time and on budget. Our team is our greatest asset and we are always up for a challenge. We are opening a new branch in the US very soon; in the meantime, feel free to contact us if you are interested in working with us.
